title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS Mitsubishi Triton 2016-on MQ 2.4L DOHC MIVEC – Fuel Manager FM629DPK Pre Filter Water Separator Kit

content.rendered:
Fuel Manager Fuel Filter / Water Separator Kit for:
2016 Mitsubishi Triton MQ MR / Pajero Sport
2.4L DOHC MIVEC 16V

This Filter unit is to be used as a Pre Filter to separate water and contaminates thus avoiding costly repairs due to poor fuel quality. Kit includes very detailed fitting instructions and everything you will need and even where to fit it !

Kit FM629DPK Includes:
• 1x Filter assembly 30 Mic (1x)
Made by Stanadyne in the USA !
(Filters down to 30 Microns !)
• Spare Filter (x1)
• 10mm Fuel Hose 1x 1mtr
• Bracket (x1)
• Required fittings: (x18) Plugs, adaptors, barb fittings, adaptors, bolts, nuts, washers, clamps, zip tie
• Thread Paste Sealant (6ml Tube)

Download PDF Info >

Install all fittings and plugs with the thread paste.
